Check out my PictureM Blog. Looks very rough and hard to use. But hey it’s still in beta, right? Isn’t everything? The Filmstrip and Slideshow features are very cool but again are unpolished and non-intuitive as well as non linkable (the preceding links to my slideshow and my filmstrip are Javascript links that therefore don’t work!). I think there’s some real potential here ; I’ll wait for 2.0. Until then I’ll use Flickr (disclosure: I am addicted to Flickr; I have uploaded over 2000 pictures there and I know and like Caterina and Stewart, 2 of the key Flickr people!).
